title: Projects
text:
Currently working on a quality improvement project with the infection prevention team at University Hospitals located in Cleveland, Ohio. The focus of the project is to obtain baseline data on hand hygiene compliance within the ICU. This baseline data will be used in a gap analysis to identify causes of non-compliance and develop interventions to promote a better environment of care. The project focuses on the implementation of multiple interventions in the forms of engineered controls, enhanced education of staff and policy changes-all of which are driven by the collection of both quantitative and quantitative data. I have a strong interest in infection control and disease prevention and have found this work to be both informative and rewarding.

title: Welcome to my website
text:
LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Email
  




Welcome to my website
I am Atticus Kenny a public health practitioner and current Masters of Public Health candidate at Case Western Reserve University. I have dedicated my personal and professional life to promoting and protecting better health outcomes for all the communities I serve, interact with and live within. On this website, I offer a synopsis of my skill sets, working experience, and future interest.
I offer over 5 years of experience in the field of environmental health with work in compliance, regulation, surveillance, covid emergency response and community outreach initiatives. I am currently acting as a program coordinator in the environmental health division of Summit County Public Health. I Offer a broad skill set in programmatic development, contract execution, workflow process analysis, and training.
I invite you to explore my website and learn more about me and my work as both a community member and a professional. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects.
